test_results.test_name: PDW % Interpretation <9.0 Lower than normal range; may indicate iron or B12 deficiency, bone marrow disorders 9.0 - 17.0 Normal range; indicates a normal variation in the size of platelets in the blood Higher than normal range; may indicate liver disease, bone marrow disorders, or immune > 17.0 thrombocytopenia
